title.rendered: Anker Lightning Cable, Powerline II [3ft MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Cable/Sync Lightning Cord Compatible with iPhone…

content.rendered:
(*8*)

Model Number: A8432

PowerLine II
Lightning Cable (3-Pack) The Cable That’s Yours For Life

From Strength to Strength
PowerLine II tolerates being bent over 12,000 occasions, lasting an unlimited 12x longer than different Lightning cables.

(*11*) Compatibility
MFi certification means complete peace of thoughts as a result of PowerLine II is totally Apple approved. Designed to work flawlessly with iPhone, iPad, iPod or any system with a Lightning port.

Lasts a Lifetime
To present our perception in PowerLine II, we’re providing a hassle-free substitute for all high quality points. Not for half a 12 months, not for 18 months, however for a complete lifetime. It will be the final cable you may ever want to purchase.

(*6*) With
iPhone 11 / X / XS / XR / XS Max / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5, iPad Pro / Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4, iPad (4th technology), iPod nano (seventh technology) and iPod contact (fifth technology), AirPods and AirPods with Wireless Charging Case.

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Strength In Numbers: Extreme reinforcement ensures inner wiring is protected to maintain telephones charging—capable of help over 175 lb (80kg).
Ultimate (*7*): Lasts 12x longer than different Lightning cables and confirmed to face up to over 12,000 bends in strict laboratory assessments.
Charge Fast: MFi certification and strict high quality testing guarantee your Apple gadgets are charged safely, at their quickest attainable velocity.
A Cable for Life: We’re so assured about PowerLine II’s long-lasting efficiency that we gave it a hassle-free, lifetime guarantee.
What You Get: 3 × Anker PowerLine II Lightning Cable, (3 ft together with each ends), a hassle-free lifetime guarantee and pleasant customer support.
